content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(2.5, 1.5)
Consists of small-electric-pole at position(2.5, 1.5) and burner-inserter at position(3.5, 0.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(40.0, -79.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill at position(43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position(40.0, -82.0)
-  Burner mining drill at position(43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position(45.0, -83.0)
-  Burner mining drill at position(43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position(42.0, -81.0)
-  Burner mining drill at position(43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position(45.0, -80.0)
-  Burner mining drill at position(43.0, -84.0) and a furnace at position(40.0, -79.0)

### Lab at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of lab at position(0.5, 0.5), small-electric-pole at position(2.5, 2.5), small-electric-pole at position(2.5, 1.5), small-electric-pole at position(4.5, 5.5), small-electric-pole at position(8.5, 9.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when placing entities
- Ensure there is no existing object in the way before attempting to place an entity
### Errors when inserting items
- Make sure there is a nearby entity that can accept the item before attempting to insert
### Errors when extracting items
- Ensure the entity contains the item to be extracted before attempting to extract
### Errors when using burner inserter
- Ensure the inserter has fuel before attempting to use it
### Errors when using lab
- Ensure the lab has power before attempting to research
### Errors when using furnace
- Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt
